item.title: Speed up CI for monorepos
item.description: A pragmatic route to 3–10× faster pipelines using caching and graph-aware jobs.

item.title: Speed up CI for monorepos — Summary
Building Static Sites with Next.js
item.description: How to export and deploy Next.js apps as static sites on GitHub Pages or any CDN.

item.title: Building Static Sites with Next.js — Summary
item.description: Shipping Next.js as a static site is about a predictable build plus the right deployment wiring. Enable output: 'export', set a base path when serving from a project subdirectory, and use GitHub Actions to export and publish the out/ folder so assets resolve cleanly on GitHub Pages or any CDN.
